name: Patton
desc: A Mondstadter who works at Angel's Share. He can be found outside the tavern advertising the latest discounts and wines.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
That day, you passed Dawn Winery, clutching a bottle of fine wine in your hand, to be delivered to Mondstadt. Daylight was failing, and you were hoping to use one of the small roads by the river, only to hear hilichurl voices ahead of you...
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: When the Action Phase begins, the opposing active character will be affected by Hydro</color>
<color=#ccbfad>Hint: Use the Wet status proactively to trigger Elemental Reactions on your opponents!</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>

customize.name: Moneta della fortuna
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
The waiter of Angel's Share fiddles with the Casket of Tomes in his hand, signaling you to duel with him.

customize.name: Fischl
customize.desc:
"Fischl, Prinzessin der Verurteilung!" Fischl

"Oz, mio figlio, distendi le tue ali e tessimi un nuovo destino nell'oscurità della notte!"

"Mein Fräulein, non possono aiutarla a sostituire una carta..."

customize.name: Bennett
customize.desc:
"Trial by Fire" Bennett

Once you know that you will certainly lose, then you must certainly know the way to win.

customize.name: Mona
customize.desc:
Mona, Riflesso astrale

VVittoria o sconfitta? È tutto scritto nelle stelle.

Collei, Germoglio di rinascita

"Urlando il nome della tua carta ad alta voce potrai aumentarne notevolmente il potere... Stai scherzando, vero?"
